PolicyPage.Name: Medical Insurance
PolicyPage.Title: Medical Insurance
PolicyPage.BodyCopy:
All those traveling on a University-sponsored trip must have acceptable health and accident insurance (All students enrolled at BYU-Idaho must either purchase accident and health insurance through the University or demonstrate that they are covered under a currently active and valid policy which coverage meets the requirements of the University). It is the responsibility of the travel leader to verify with the Student Health Center that all students that will be traveling are properly insured. Supplemental health and accident insurance may be made available if deemed necessary by the trip manager. Additional information can be found at the Risk Management website under Field Trip Insurance.

The purchase of HTH Worldwide Health insurance is mandatory for all international travel involving students. This supplemental insurance provides coverage for sicknesses and injury while traveling abroad. HTH also provides services to coordinate medical care and ensure that individuals get the best service possible. Additional information about the insurance as well as how to procure coverage can be found at the Risk Management website.
